text: {{Infobox writer | name = Jaroslav Seifert | image = Jaroslav Seifert 1981 foto Hana Hamplová.jpg | imagesize = 250px | caption = Jaroslav Seifert 1981 photo Hana Hamplová | birth_date = | birth_place = Žižkov, Austria-Hungary | death_date = | death_place = Prague, Czechoslovakia | occupation = Writer, poet, journalist | nationality = Czech | awards = | signature = Signature of Jaroslav Seifert.jpg }} Jaroslav Seifert (; 23 September 1901 – 10 January 1986) was a Nobel Prize–winning Czechoslovak writer, poet and journalist. In 1984, Seifert won the Nobel Prize in Literature."The Nobel Prize in Literature 1984". Nobelprize.org. Nobel Media AB 2014. title: Jaroslav Seifert
